ys.succinct.util

Interface BitVector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BitSet, Rank, Select
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SamplingBitVector

    public interface BitVector
extends BitSet, Rank, Select
    An object that represents a set of bits and defines the rank/select operations on them. It can handle up to Integer.MAX_VALUE bits.
    Author:
    Yauheni Shahun

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface ys.succinct.util.BitSet

        get, set, size

      • Methods inherited from interface ys.succinct.util.Rank

        excess, rank, rank, rank0

      • Methods inherited from interface ys.succinct.util.Select

        select
